snippet.title: Bravers Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
📢 Announcement teaser for Bravers game by 8-bit Caviar.
✔   Wishlist on Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/1349460
🌐 Website - https://braversgame.com

Deep in the underground world of a planet devastated by the Great Impact, Bravers invites you to become a captain of your own ship. You will lead your crew through a fascinating journey full of danger, mysteries, friends, and foes. Are you brave enough to take it on?

Discord ‣ https://braversgame.com/discord
Twitter ‣ https://twitter.com/8bit_caviar
Instagram ‣ https://instagram.com/8bitcaviar
Facebook ‣ https://facebook.com/8bitcaviar
Reddit ‣ http://reddit.com/r/8bitcaviar
